fulltext:
PERSONAL INFORMATION 
Name: Tu Truong Anh 
Date of birth: March 29, 1988 
Gender: Male 
Nationality: Vietnam 
Email:  
Phone:  
SUMMARY 
Primary skills 
• Have nearly 3 years of experience in .NET MVC, .NET Core Framework 
• Have 2 years of experience in Angular 2-3-4-5-6 
• Have good experience in Power BI report. 
• Have extensive experience in Web development 
• Have extensive experience in Application development 
• Have good experience in SQL Database  
EDUCATION 
2001 – 2013: Aptech Certified Computer Professional, CNC Aptech - Ho Chi Minh City.  
2014 – 2016: BSc (Hons) Computing programme, London School of Commerce – London.  
December 2018: BI Reporting Certification of Microsoft 
LANGUAGES 
Vietnamese: Native language 
English: Fluently 
EMPLOYMENT HISTORY 
February 2018 to current time: NOIS CO., LTD. 
EXPERIENCE 
November 2016 to December 2017: 5STARS Software Solution, Company Software Engineer 
February 2018 to the current time:  NOIS Co., Company Software Engineer 
PROJECTS 
DMS (Distributor Management System)  
Project Description 
This is a website application designed for the management of sale employees. It can 
synchronize data between mobile devices to server. A sale-man can get data every 
morning to start working and synchronize data to the server at end of the day. 
Technology 
• Asp.net Webform 
• Google maps API.  
• SQL server 
• JavaScript, JQuery, Ajax, CSS, , Bootstrap 
Environment 
• Visual Studio IDE 
• SQL database server. 
• SVN Source Control System. 
SCC Management 
Project Description 
This is a web application that provides functionalities of product management, 
promotion management and order management. 
Technology 
• Asp.net Webform 
• .Net framework 4.6 
• Google maps API.  
• JavaScript, JQuery, Ajax, CSS, Swagger, Bootstrap, Angular JS 
Environment 
• Visual Studio IDE 
• SQL database server.  
• SVN Source Control System. 
Vadodara Municipal Corporation (VMC App) 
Project Description 
This is a project that combines web application and mobile application. It was 
designed mainly for Vadodara citizens. It provides many features like zoo, plant 
garden, heritages information. By using app, user also can submit complaints, 
reports of services in Vadodara, or ask for an urgent help from hotline number.  The 
project has mobile application and web portal for normal users and an admin portal 
for admins to manage application data. 
Technology 
• .NET Core 2.0 
• Entity Framework, LinQ 
• SQL server 
• Angular 5 
• JavaScript, JQuery, Ajax, CSS, Swagger, Bootstrap 
Environment 
• Visual Studio IDE 
• Visual Studio Code 
• SQL database server. 
• Gitlab Source Control System. 
Maxell – Flight Safety Management  
Project Description 
Maxell is a project for flight safety management of Snokcoot Airlines.  
Technology 
• .NET Core 2.0, LinQ 
• Sharepoint List, Microsoft Flow 
• Angular 6 
• JavaScript, JQuery, Ajax, CSS, Swagger, Bootstrap 
Environment 
• Visual Studio IDE 
• Visual Studio Code 
• Microsoft Sharepoint 
• Gitlab Source Control System. 
Alythex 
Project Description 
Alythex application is an application that developed to embed Power BI report as 
well as to manage the report data source. From the admin side, an admin can 
modify the data and this data will be displayed in the report in client portal. This 
project has combined .Net Core API and Angular 4 Framework to manage for both 
admin site and client side.  
Technology 
• .NET Core 2.0 
• Entity Framework, LinQ 
• SQL server 
• Angular 5 
• JavaScript, JQuery, Ajax, CSS, Swagger, Bootstrap 
Environment 
• Visual Studio IDE 
• Visual Studio Code 
• SQL database server. 
• Gitlab Source Control System. 
• Power BI desktop 
Power BI Embedded 
Project Description 
This is an application that embedded a power BI report in a website. The report data 
is connected from SQL server database and excel files, and it can automatically 
refresh periodically through Power BI gateway. 
Technology 
• Asp.Net MVC 4.0  
• SQL server 
• Power BI Service 
• Power BI Data gateway 
• JavaScript, CSS, Bootstrap 
Environment 
• Visual Studio IDE 
• Visual Studio Code  
• SQL database server. 
• Power BI Desktop 
• Gitlab Source Control System. 
SKILLS/CERTIFICATIONS/PROGRAMMING LANGUAGES 
Programming 
• C# .NET Core, .NET MVC, Web API, Entity Framework 
• Database programming with MSSQL. 
• Front-end development with Bootstrap, Angular 4-5, JavaScript, jQuery, Ajax, 
Responsive, Html 5, CSS 3 
Software, IDE tools 
• Microsoft Visual Studio 
• Microsoft Visual Studio Code 
• SVN/Git system  
Foreign languages 
• English skills:  
+ Good at reading, writing, speaking,  
+ Average good at listening 
 OTHER SKILLS 
• Have a good logic and research skill. 
• Strong team work spirit. 
• Work well unsupervised as directed of under pressure. 
• Adapt to work in environment easily. 
• Be able to analyze and resolve problem. 
• Being able to self-managed tasks assigned.
